description: Complete client onboarding for new client Acme Corp - send welcome materials, setup accounts, and schedule kickoff

userStories.title: Send welcome email to client
userStories.description: Send personalized welcome email to new client with onboarding checklist and next steps
acceptanceCriteria: Email includes link to schedule kickoff
BCC sent to internal team for visibility

userStories.title: Create client folder structure
userStories.description: Set up organized folder structure in vault for new client documents and communications
acceptanceCriteria: Create subfolders: Contracts/, Invoices/, Communications/, Projects/
Create README.md in client folder with client details
Folder structure verified with ls command

userStories.title: Create initial invoice in Xero
userStories.description: Generate and send initial setup fee invoice for client onboarding
acceptanceCriteria: Invoice created in Xero: $500 setup fee
Invoice includes description: 'Client Onboarding - Acme Corp'
Invoice logged to Accounting/ folder in vault
userStories.notes: Use Xero MCP or xero-manager skill

userStories.title: Schedule kickoff meeting
userStories.description: Schedule 1-hour kickoff meeting with client and project team
acceptanceCriteria: Calendar invite sent to client contact
Calendar invite includes: you (AI Employee owner), project manager
Meeting scheduled within next 3 business days
Agenda includes: project overview, timeline, questions
Calendar event logged to Briefings/ or Calendar/
userStories.notes: Use Calendar MCP or calendar-manager skill

userStories.title: Create project plan document
userStories.description: Generate initial project plan document based on kickoff meeting details
acceptanceCriteria: Plan includes key dates and contact information
userStories.notes: Use content-generator skill if available, or create manually

userStories.title: Add client to Slack workspace
userStories.description: Add new client channel to Slack for team communication
acceptanceCriteria: Key team members invited to channel
Client onboarding checklist posted in channel
userStories.notes: Use Slack MCP or slack-manager skill
